title: Set a Reorder Point for a New Item
description: A new product is being introduced. An inventory planner must set its initial reorder point and safety stock levels in the system.

tasks.description: Retrieve the new product's details, including forecasted sales and supplier lead time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary data inputs.

tasks.description: Calculate the safety stock level based on demand variability and lead time.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safety stock of 50 units is calculated.

tasks.description: Calculate the reorder point (demand during lead time + safety stock).
tasks.expected_outcome: A reorder point of 200 units is calculated.

tasks.description: Update the product's record in the inventory system with the new reorder point and safety stock values.
tasks.expected_outcome: The item's replenishment parameters are now set.
